subject: Science
title: What Is an Atom?
description: A 60-second lesson on What Is an Atom?.

hook.text: Everything you see, touch, and breathe is made of atoms. They're unimaginably small.

buildup.text: An atom has a dense nucleus of protons and neutrons, orbited by electrons.

discovery.text: If an atom were a stadium, the nucleus would be a marble on the 50-yard line.

twist.text: Atoms are 99.9999% empty space. You are mostly nothing.

climax.text: If you removed all the empty space from every human on Earth, we'd fit in a sugar cube.

punchline.text: You're made of atoms that are mostly empty space. You're basically a ghost.

quiz.question: What makes up most of an atom's volume?
